text: Toofan (Hindi:तूफान; ) is an upcoming Indian Hindi sports film directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra and starring Farhan Akhtar as a national level boxer, along with Paresh Rawal, Mrunal Thakur and Isha Talwar. It was announced on 16 January 2019 and filming begun on 24 August 2019 in Dongri. ==Cast== * Farhan Akhtar as a boxer * Paresh Rawal as a coach * Mrunal Thakur == References == == External links == * * Category:Hindi-language films Category:Indian boxing films Category:Indian films Category:Indian sports films Category:Upcoming films Category:Films postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Toofan (2020 film)
